inclusion.criterion: Patients with known aortic valve area of less than 1 cm² on echocardiogram
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%

inclusion.criterion: Ambulatory and expected to be able to complete 6 minute walk test
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: no mention of inability to ambulate or complete 6 minute walk test

exclusion.criterion: Other significant (moderate or severe) valvular heart disease
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: bicuspid aortic valve, but no other significant valvular heart disease mentioned

exclusion.criterion: Unable to complete 6 minute walk test
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: no mention of inability to ambulate or complete 6 minute walk test

notes: Unknown if patient can provide informed consent, and if scheduled for Cardiac MRI.
